## data preprocessing
train_preproc <- recipe(label ~. , data = sample_train) %>%
  step_scale(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%
  prep(training = sample_train) %>%
  bake(NULL)

Warning: Column(s) have zero variance so scaling cannot be used: `pixel0`, `pixel1`, `pixel2`, `pixel3`, `pixel4`, `pixel5`, `pixel6`, `pixel7`, `pixel8`, `pixel9`, `pixel10`, `pixel11`, `pixel12`, `pixel13`, `pixel14`, `pixel15`, `pixel16`, `pixel17`, `pixel18`, `pixel19`, `pixel20`, `pixel21`, `pixel22`, `pixel23`, `pixel24`, `pixel25`, `pixel26`, `pixel27`, `pixel28`, `pixel29`, `pixel30`, `pixel31`, `pixel48`, `pixel49`, `pixel50`, `pixel51`, `pixel52`, `pixel53`, `pixel54`, `pixel55`, `pixel56`, `pixel57`, `pixel58`, `pixel59`, `pixel81`, `pixel82`, `pixel83`, `pixel84`, `pixel85`, `pixel87`, `pixel111`, `pixel112`, `pixel113`, `pixel139`, `pixel140`, `pixel141`, `pixel167`, `pixel168`, `pixel169`, `pixel196`, `pixel224`, `pixel336`, `pixel392`, `pixel419`, `pixel420`, `pixel421`, `pixel448`, `pixel476`, `pixel477`, `pixel504`, `pixel505`, `pixel531`, `pixel532`, `pixel559`, `pixel560`, `pixel587`, `pixel588`, `pixel615`, `pixel616`, `pixel643`, `pixel644`, `pixel645`, `pixel671`, `pixel672`, `pixel673`, `pixel698`, `pixel699`, `pixel700`, `pixel701`, `pixel702`, `pixel725`, `pixel726`, `pixel727`, `pixel728`, `pixel729`, `pixel730`, `pixel731`, `pixel732`, `pixel753`, `pixel754`, `pixel755`, `pixel756`, `pixel757`, `pixel758`, `pixel759`, `pixel760`, `pixel780`, `pixel781`, `pixel782` and `pixel783`.
